description: Try our easy to follow Super Easy Ice-Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Super Easy Ice-Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place a metal 8-cup loaf pan into the freezer to chill. Place 395g can chilled sweetened condensed milk, 300ml thickened cream, 200ml crème fraiche and 1 tsp vanilla bean paste into a medium mixing bowl. Beat with electric beaters for 6 minutes or until mixture is thick and creamy. Pour into pan. Cover with plastic wrap and freeze for 4 hours or overnight or until firm.
